comment.author: 50867996@N00
comment._content:
(Please excuse if this is a duplicate; my original comment doesn't seem to have shown up.)

1923? Not a chance. Look at the streamlined all-metal car in he background. That has to be 1936 or later.

comment.author: 96047955@N00
comment._content: Agreed; certainly no older than 1935. What little I can see of it looks a lot like a 1937 Ford "Humpback" Tudor.

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
Hello, Andy and jwpretd! Thank you for your collective enthusiasm and keen eyes. 
After closer inspection of the slide, my colleagues agree this photo was probably taken in the late 1930s or early 1940s, but since there is no identifying information on the slide, we cannot determine the exact dates. 
This record has been updated. 

Thank you!

Susannah 
Smithsonian Institution Archives

comment.author: 58446043@N04
comment._content: This camp is not Dinosaur National Monument as there are no conifer trees of this type (look like spruce) anywhere near the quarry. In addition, the vintage of the vehicle is too late for the Smithsonian work at the Monument (1923).

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
Thank you, Ktneprac!  We agree that this is probably not from 1923, although we do not have a specific date on the label for this slide.  This slide is also not labeled with any locality information.  The locality information was taken from the finding aid.  I will forward your comment to the Department of Paleobiology.  If any of the staff can agree with your statement, we will modify the location in the caption.  Thanks again!!!

sonoe
Field Book Project
